page.title: 05EMPLOYMENT IN REDRUTH
page.content: 45 school leavers have been employed (including Y.T.S) by businesses on the CARDREW INDUSTRIAL ESTATE over the past 2 years. {Training..}12(63%) of businesses offer training with the company.4(21%)offer training outside the company. {RAW MATERIALS..}21% of raw materials used by the businesses originate in Cornwall,26% from Europe,45% from other parts of Britain,26% from other countries. {PRODUCT/SERVICE PROVIDED..}89% of products are marketed within Cornwall,42% in Europe,68% in other parts of Britain,42% in other countries. {TRANSPORT..}products are distributed.. a)company's transport system:12(63%) b)specialist transport forms:7(37%)
